_comment: This file provides update instructions for all deployment types (Docker, Native, Source). It is used as a local fallback if the latest instructions cannot be fetched from GitHub. To update instructions for all users, edit this file and push to the main branch on GitHub.

docker.title: Docker Installation

steps.title: Stop and remove the current container
steps.command: sudo docker stop zfdash && sudo docker rm zfdash

steps.title: Run the new container
steps.command:
sudo docker run -d --name zfdash \
  --privileged \
  --network=host \
  --device=/dev/zfs:/dev/zfs \
  -v zfdash_config:/root/.config/ZfDash \
  -v zfdash_data:/opt/zfdash/data \
  -v /etc:/host-etc:ro \
  -v /dev/disk:/dev/disk:ro \
  -v /run/udev:/run/udev:ro \
  -p 5001:5001 \
  --restart unless-stopped \
  ad4mts/zfdash:latest

notes: If the run command has changed since your last update, using the old command may cause issues.
If source is local cache -> check the GitHub Readme for the latest instructions.

native.title: Native/Binary Installation

steps.title: Manual Update (Alternative)
steps.description:
1. Download release from GitHub
2. Extract: tar -xzf zfdash-*.tar.gz
3. Run: sudo ./install.sh

notes: Your configuration and credentials will be preserved during the update.

steps.title: Pull and sync dependencies
steps.command: git pull origin main && uv sync

steps.title: Restart the application
steps.description: Restart ZfDash to apply the changes
